r.s: Provides functions for function traces and profiling
r.d:
The Xdebug extension helps you debugging your script by providing a lot of valuable debug information. The debug information that Xdebug can provide includes the following:
* stack and function traces in error messages with: o full parameter display for user defined functions o function name, file name and line indications o support for member functions * memory allocation * protection for infinite recursions
Xdebug also provides:
* profiling information for PHP scripts * code coverage analysis * capabilities to debug your scripts interactively with a debug client
